channel.title: Why do these things happen?
channel.description:
[size=12pt][center]Most of you have probably seen some bugs in specific servers, that don't really effect the server at all, but it can just be kinda annoying.
For example: I play a server, and sometimes you have to walk before the veng button registers, even if you've been playing for 8 hours straight. I mean, the code for veng works fine, the lunars code works fine, but sometimes I'll spam veng like 10 times and nothing happens, but if I walk 1 step, I can veng.
Why is it that these things happen in servers?[/center][/size]

item.title: Why do these things happen?
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

PI_Developer:

is that it?

The people playing the servers generally don’t care. There are obviously people who do, but they are the minority, so flaws get overlooked as long as they operate semi-alright.

Read full topic

item.title: Why do these things happen?
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“PI_Developer, post:4, topic:526424”]is that it?[/quote]I’m not really sure what kind of answer you were expecting…

Read full topic

item.title: Why do these things happen?
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

A lot of the people who work on servers put things out when they are “good enough.” That or they can’t do it properly.

Read full topic

item.title: Why do these things happen?
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Because they’re badly programmed, normally. They might just be small things that the owner hasn’t noticed - try submitting a bug report to them and if they’re at all competent then they’ll look into it.

Read full topic
